name: ReverseComparator_equalsTest
description: Unit tests for the equals method of the ReverseComparator class.

test_cases.name: testEquals_SameInstance
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with the same instance.

test_cases.name: testEquals_NullObject
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with a null object.

test_cases.name: testEquals_DifferentClass
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with an object of a different class.

test_cases.name: testEquals_SameComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with two instances of the same comparator.

test_cases.name: testEquals_DifferentComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with two instances of different comparators.
